OOC: Sorry for the delay...

Bic:

Vlad: As I always am!

He started running towards her and launched his mini-missiles just in 
front of her, sending a dust wall in the air. She would expect him 
coming full-force, so he went to the left at the last moment and send 
laser fire at her from his pulse laser pistols.
